examples.query: I absolutely love this new restaurant! The food was amazing and the service was excellent.
This product is terrible. It broke after just one day and customer support was unhelpful.
What a fantastic day! The weather is perfect and I'm feeling great.
I'm really disappointed with the movie. The plot was confusing and the acting was poor.
